comments.text: I like using covers, because I can put something else in the machine, too. But I hate changing the covers because I have a weighted blanket that weighs 20kg
comments.author: @laalaa3281

comments.text: My aunt has switched to these and raves about them every time we see her!
comments.author: @kpwxx

comments.text: But don’t you miss having different designs/material/thickness for your bedclothes? If I had the same ones on all year round, I’d get so sick of them!
comments.author: @Lynda_NicAirt

comments.text: Keep being amazing, Lucy. The way you live your life is an inspiration to us all. My 'little' girl, now almost 19, is severely disabled, non-verbal, and visually impaired. I care for her at home with my wife. I'm amazed and inspired by her every day, just as I am by you and the many others in our societies who are differentially-abled (that's what I call my daughter :) ).
comments.author: @hcc6757

comments.text:

Unrelated, but that yellow cardigan complements the red of your hair wonderfully.
